title: Candy Crush creators King.com logo font
author: aerion07

comments.content:
I would greatly appreciate if anyone could point me in the right direction. I was asked to put together a logo with a similar font to the one used by king.com (creators of the Candy Crush saga app/game). The "loading" text seems to be Candice font, but what I truly need is the "King" text's font.

Thank you!
hm. whatever was used has obviously been manipulated quite a bit to form the crown shape. lots of customization.
